overview: An intoxicatingly nostalgic installment of the In Concert series spotlights the career of teen idol Bobby Darin, a boyishly handsome singer who grew to become one of the most popular musicians of the 1950s and '60s. Blending a variety of musical styles -- including folk, country, pop and even jazz -- Darin performs a set list of songs and medleys culled from his extensive catalog and also throws in some laughs with a few comic skits.
title: In Concert Series: Bobby Darin
